amount.description: The amount of the transaction in the specified currency.

test.description: Flag indicating if the transaction is a test transaction.

fee.description: The fee associated with the transaction.

source_type.description: The type of source for the transaction.

source_order_id.description: The identifier of the order related to the transaction.

payoucurrencyt_status.description: Indicates the status of the payout for the currency in which the transaction occurred.

payout_id.description: The identifier of the associated payout.

payout_status.description: The status of the payout associated with this transaction.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop related to the transaction.

processed_at.description: The date and time when the transaction was processed.

source_order_transaction_id.description: The transaction identifier within the order.

id.description: The unique identifier of the balance transaction.

source_id.description: The identifier of the source related to the transaction.

net.description: The final amount received after deducting fees.
